name: Valorant - Agents page concept design
description:
Here you can find design of Agents Page for the new Riot Games project called Valorant.


Few days ago there was announce of the closed beta and i am waiting so much for it. Here is heroes page where you can find all available heroes and know more about they abilities.


What's inside :

- Agents List

- Ability List

- Ability Description Block


I am always available for new projects!
